info.title: HostScore API
info.description:
This is the specification of HostScore API.

The API requests are rate limited to 10 requests/second. Callers that surpass
the rate limit will receive an error response with a `429` HTTP status code.

tags.name: hosts
tags.description: Information about the hosts on the Sia network

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of hosts

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Indicates whether to retrieve all hosts or online only

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country that the hosts can be located in

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of the page, starting from 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page

more.description: An indicator if more results are available

total.description: The total number of results without pagination

get.description: Retrieve a list of host public keys based on certain criteria

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: The node, which the measurements are relative to

parameters.name: maxStoragePrice
parameters.description: Maximum storage price per byte per block

parameters.name: maxUploadPrice
parameters.description: Maximum upload price in per byte

parameters.name: maxLatency
parameters.description: Maximum latency of a host in nanoseconds

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
The country that the hosts can be located in; repeated params
are supported

keys.description: A list of host public keys

get.description: Retrieve the information about a specific host

Retrieve a list of host scans, sorted by timestamp, from the most
recent to the oldest

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: The node, which performed the scans

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Indicates whether to retrieve all scans or successful only

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: beginning timestamp of the result set

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: ending timestamp of the result set

get.description:
Retrieve a list of host benchmarks, sorted by timestamp, from the
most recent to the oldest

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: The node, which performed the benchmarks

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Indicates whether to retrieve all benchmarks or successful only

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: beginning timestamp of the result set

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: ending timestamp of the result set

get.description:
Retrieve a list of historic price changes, sorted by timestamp, from
the oldest to the most recent

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: beginning timestamp of the result set

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: ending timestamp of the result set

changes.description: A list of historic price changes

get.description: Retrieve the number of online hosts and the total number of hosts

Retrieve the network averages split by tiers:
- Tier 1: top 10 hosts
- Tier 2: top 100 hosts minus Tier 1
- Tier 3: the rest
Retrieve the list of countries that the hosts are located in

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Indicates whether to retrieve the countries of all hosts or online only

get.description: Retrieve the current status of the service

version.description: The version of the portal backend
